alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Custer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:51AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WASHITA...SOUTHEASTERN ROGER MILLS...CUSTER AND NORTHEASTERN BECKHAM COUNTIES... At 451 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Hammon, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Elk City, Clinton, Sayre, Cheyenne, Arapaho, Hammon, Canute, Butler, Foss, Strong City, Foss Reservoir, Moorewood, Stafford, and Berlin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
